includedAssets.title: When She Was Bad
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep1 - When She Was Bad
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy returns from her summer vacation with an attitude problem and suffers recurring nightmares involving the Master.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy returns from her summer vacation with an attitude problem and suffers recurring nightmares involving the Master.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy returns from her summer vacation with an attitude problem and suffers recurring nightmares involving the Master.

includedAssets.title: Some Assembly Required
includedAssets.synopsis: Two science club nerds use body parts to create the 'perfect girlfriend' for a teenager who has been brought back from the dead.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Two science club nerds use body parts to create the 'perfect girlfriend' for a teenager who has been brought back from the dead.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Two science club nerds use body parts to create the 'perfect girlfriend' for a teenager who has been brought back from the dead.

includedAssets.title: School Hard
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy's mother and friend become trapped inside Sunnydale High School when a vampire named Spike launches an attack against the Slayer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy's mother and friend become trapped inside Sunnydale High School when a vampire named Spike launches an attack against the Slayer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy's mother and friend become trapped inside Sunnydale High School when a vampire named Spike launches an attack against the Slayer.

includedAssets.title: Inca Mummy Girl
includedAssets.synopsis: A beautiful Inca princess, who was buried alive in a tomb 500 years ago, is brought back to life - and falls in love with the gorgeous Xander.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A beautiful Inca princess, who was buried alive in a tomb 500 years ago, is brought back to life - and falls in love with the gorgeous Xander.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A beautiful Inca princess, who was buried alive in a tomb 500 years ago, is brought back to life - and falls in love with the gorgeous Xander.

includedAssets.title: Reptile Boy
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and Cordelia attend a party where they are offered as human sacrifices to a reptile-like creature.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and Cordelia attend a party where they are offered as human sacrifices to a reptile-like creature.

includedAssets.title: Halloween
includedAssets.synopsis: At Halloween, Buffy and her friends visit an unusual costume shop where customers assume the character of the costume they are wearing.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: At Halloween, Buffy and her friends visit an unusual costume shop where customers assume the character of the costume they are wearing.

includedAssets.title: Lie To Me
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy is lured into a trap by a group of teenagers who hope that Spike will make them vampires in exchange for giving him the Slayer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy is lured into a trap by a group of teenagers who hope that Spike will make them vampires in exchange for giving him the Slayer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy is lured into a trap by a group of teenagers who hope that Spike will make them vampires in exchange for giving him the Slayer.

includedAssets.title: The Dark Age
includedAssets.synopsis: Giles' past comes back to haunt him as a demon he and Ethan Rayne summoned in their wild youth seeks them out in Sunnydale.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Giles' past comes back to haunt him as a demon he and Ethan Rayne summoned in their wild youth seeks them out in Sunnydale.

includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Spike brings in three professional bounty hunters to eliminate Buffy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Spike brings in three professional bounty hunters to eliminate Buffy.

includedAssets.title: What's My Line Part 2
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep10 - What's My Line Part 2

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy joins forces with another Slayer in the hope of saving Angel from the clutches of Spike and Drusilla.

includedAssets.title: Ted
includedAssets.synopsis: Joyce is romanced by a seemingly perfect man, Ted Buchanan, but Buffy suspects things are not quite what they seem.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Joyce is romanced by a seemingly perfect man, Ted Buchanan, but Buffy suspects things are not quite what they seem.

includedAssets.title: Bad Eggs
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and her friends are in trouble when the eggs they are given in health class turn out to be prehistoric parasites that take over their lives.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and her friends are in trouble when the eggs they are given in health class turn out to be prehistoric parasites that take over their lives.

includedAssets.title: Surprise (Part 1)

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: To give Buffy a surprise on her birthday, Drusilla and Spike bring together the body parts of a demon who cannot be killed.

includedAssets.title: Phases

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and her friends discover secrets about themselves as they battle a werewolf, its hunter and their own emotions.

includedAssets.title: Bewitched, Bothered & Bewildered
includedAssets.synopsis: Xander turns to a witch for help after Cordelia dumps him. Meanwhile, Buffy receives a gift from Angel on Valentine's Day.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Xander turns to a witch for help after Cordelia dumps him. Meanwhile, Buffy receives a gift from Angel on Valentine's Day.

includedAssets.synopsis: While hospitalised with a severe case of the 'flu, Buffy battles a demon that sucks the life out of sick children.

includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep19 - I Only Have Eyes For You

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sunnydale High School is haunted by the ghosts who re-enact their tragic romance using the bodies of two of the school's students.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Members of the Sunnydale swim team are killed by a gilled monster of unknown origin.

includedAssets.title: Becoming Part 1

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy returns to Sunnydale, but her new attitude quickly puts herself and her friends in extreme danger. Second season of the fantasy classic starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy is back, but her attitude quickly puts herself and her friends in danger. Second season of the fantasy classic starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy returns to Sunnydale, but her new attitude quickly puts herself and her friends in extreme danger. Second season of the fantasy classic starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.

includedIn.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer
includedIn.synopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.
